note_title: Changes in Inventories of Traded Goods
summation_rule: Calculate opening inventory minus closing inventory. A positive result means inventory decreased (added to expenses). A negative result means inventory increased (reduces expenses).
additional_instructions: Filter trial balance entries with Ind AS Minor 'Traded goods'. Calculate the change as Opening Inventory minus Closing Inventory. Present the opening and closing balances separately, then show the net change. Inventory values should be displayed as positive amounts.
